name: Stella's Photographic Journey (demo)
description:
Stella is a young amateur photographer travelling through space in her tiny starship looking for interesting views she could capture. What will she encounter on her journey.
Stella's Photographic Journey is a (demo of a) short sweet and peaceful sci-fi visual novel,  made as my contribution to Crunchless Challenge game jam.  I wasn't able to  finish the entire project within the given timeframe, so I changed my goal to crafting a demo. Hopefully I'll release the full novel within the year 2021, but that is not set in stone.

Features:

  • carefully handcrafted art made traditionally using watercolours
  • simple and peaceful story - no rush, no pressure
  • chill lofi music by Prod. Riddiman

Hope you'll like it.

(I'm an amateur at writing and English is not my first language, so if you notice any typos or awkwardly worded dialogues, please don't hesitate to tell me about it, I'll fix and update it.)
